verses.roman:
dākṣiṇātya-vipra tāṅre ghare lañā gelā
tabe dui bhāi vṛndāvanere calilā

synonyms: dākṣiṇātya-vipra—the brāhmaṇa from Deccan; tāṅre—him (Rūpa Gosvāmī); ghare lañā—taking to his home; gelā—went; tabe—thereafter; dui bhāi—the two brothers; vṛndāvanere—toward Vṛndāvana; calilā—departed.
translation: The brāhmaṇa from Deccan took Rūpa Gosvāmī to his home, and thereafter the two brothers departed for Vṛndāvana.
